text: mariyu allah tanu srstincina vastuvulalo konnintini nida koraku niyamincadu mariyu parvatalalo miku raksana sthalalanu erparacadu. Mariyu miru vedi nundi kapadukovataniki vastralanu mariyu yud'dham nundi kapadukovataniki kavacalanu iccadu. Miru ayanaku vidheyulai undalani, i vidhanga ayana mipai tana anugrahalanu purti cestunnadu
